author: mark-grimes
body:
First tranche of `phase1Pixel` era additions.  I'll try and split these down by package to make them easier to integrate.  This one is for the digitisation.

There should be no change whatsoever unless the `Run2_2017` era is active (the only top-level era that contains `phase1Pixel`).

The change to the import in the pixelDigitizer_cfi.py file is for technical reasons, otherwise the pileup dependent inefficiency is not applied.  Depending on how #12256 pans out this might be able to be removed (will do that later though).

**Tests might fail until the next IB** - requires #12254 which has only just been merged.  Not sure if the relevant commit will be included automatically.

@boudoul, @atricomi
title: phase1Pixel era digitisation additions
